room_description: Deluxe Double Room with Danube River View. This spacious room features a comfortable king-sized bed, a private balcony overlooking the majestic Danube River, and modern amenities for a luxurious stay.

Executive Suite with Castle View. Indulge in the elegance of this executive suite offering stunning views of Budapest's historic Castle Hill. The suite features a spacious living area, a luxurious king-sized bed, and stylish furnishings.
special_offers: Free dinner cruise on the Danube for guests staying 3 nights or more

room_description: Standard Twin Room. Enjoy a comfortable stay in this standard twin room featuring two cozy single beds, a modern ensuite bathroom, and essential amenities for a relaxing visit to Debrecen.
special_offers: 50% discount on spa treatments for guests booking the suite

room_description: Family Suite with Riverfront Terrace. Ideal for families, this spacious suite offers a comfortable king-sized bed, a separate living area with a sofa bed, and a private terrace overlooking the scenic riverside.
Junior Suite with Garden View. Experience luxury in this stylish junior suite boasting a plush queen-sized bed, a private balcony overlooking the tranquil garden, and elegant Art Nouveau décor.
special_offers: Complimentary bottle of soft drinks upon arrival

room_description: Premium Double Room with Castle View. Enjoy breathtaking views of Eger's iconic castle from this premium double room, featuring a comfortable double bed, a spacious ensuite bathroom, and modern amenities.
special_offers: Spa package included for weekend bookings
